protein.specific_function: Calcium/calmodulin-dependent serine/threonine kinase which acts as a positive regulator of apoptosis

reference.reference_text: Kawai T, Nomura F, Hoshino K, Copeland NG, Gilbert DJ, Jenkins NA, Akira S: Death-associated protein kinase 2 is a new calcium/calmodulin-dependent protein kinase that signals apoptosis through its catalytic activity. Oncogene. 1999 Jun 10;18(23):3471-80.
